dynamic.isNotEmpty: ( cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_number is null or length(cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_number) < 1 or $csuoNumberNot$ cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_number like #csuoNumber#)
( cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_username is null or length(cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_username) < 1 or $csuoUsernameNot$ cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_username = #csuoUsername#)
( cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_alias is null or length(cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_alias) < 1 or $csuoAliasNot$ cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_alias = #csuoAlias#)
( cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_mobile is null or length(cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_mobile) < 1 or $csuoMobileNot$ cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_mobile = #csuoMobile#)
( cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_profile is null or length(cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_profile) < 1 or $csuoProfileNot$ cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_profile like #csuoProfile#)
( cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_idcard is null or length(cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_idcard) < 1 or $csuoIdcardNot$ cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_idcard = #csuoIdcard#)
( cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_remark is null or length(cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_remark) < 1 or $csuoRemarkNot$ cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_remark like #csuoRemark#)
( cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_from is null or length(cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_from) < 1 or $csuoFromNot$ cs_unit_order$suffix$.csuo_from = #csuoFrom#)
